data.title: [ci skip]Fixed warns
Downloader should use native HttpClient implementations
data.body:
We have native implementations of HttpClient now, which is great. But, AssetManager and Downloader still have a separate implementation that is dependant on libcurl, and this comes with its own ongoing bugs and issues.

Its confusing when scripting that `cc.loader.getXMLHttpRequest()` will use the native HttpClient and yet `cc.loader.loadImg(url, ...)` will not (since it is internally implemented using Downloader).

data.body:
Cocos2d-x 3.3 with Lua
The `setMaxLength` is not available sometimes. It's not easy to describe and I would talk this to QuGuanghui.
And The way to fix it is modify the `UIEditBoxImpl-ios.mm` on `Line 236`
-     return newLength <= getEditBoxImplIOS()->getMaxLength();  // delete this line
-    return (newLength<=oldLength) || (newLength <= getEditBoxImplIOS()->getMaxLength());  //add this line

data.title: iOS: ARC support
data.body:
Is it possible to add ARC support for generated project? I'm not asking for adding ARC support for cocos2d-x itself, just for game project. Many libraries require ARC support and i don't see any reason why it can't be added, at least as an additional option when starting new project.

It won't bring any performance issues as usually there are no any performance sensitive iOS code in the generated projects, just some bindings to libraries.

data.body:
This bug is a collection for all UI related improvement tasks
## Features:
- [X] Easing out for scroll view: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/12466
- [x] Slider: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/12352
- [x] Slider event handling: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/12351
- [x] Vertical scroll for PageView: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/10778
## Refine:
- [x] Slider precision: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/12350
- [x] Checkbox inside Scrollview: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/11784
- [x] Unify fontSize type for text and label: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/10082
- [x] Memory usage of Text widget: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/9004

data.title: Texture2D refactor: hardware compression
data.body: There is a `TexturePixelFormatInfoTablesValue` table in `CCTexture2D.cpp`, the entry should be determined in run time instead of compile time by Macro.

data.title: [Cpp-tests]Fixed cannot start auto test again if the timeout has occurred.
Hold on the button, and the touchEvent still keep execute when its node has been removed.
data.body:
The step is:
1. Pressed the button, and hold on it.
2. Remove, set visible false the button, keep your finger hold on the position
3. Leave your finger now, and the touchEvent (ended event) would still be executed even when button is gone.

This could be prevented by several ways, it wouldn't take a long time. 
So maybe it should be fixed?

Issue reported from zhihu
